thread.title: Sources: Trump aides' bid to plug leaks fuels government paranoia
thread.title_full: Sources: Trump aides' bid to plug leaks fuels government paranoia

author: Arshad Mohammed, Jonathan Landay and Warren Strobel
title: Sources: Trump aides' bid to plug leaks fuels government paranoia
text:
WASHINGTON, March 3 (Reuters) - President Donald Trump's Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin used his first senior staff meeting last month to tell his new aides he would not tolerate leaks to the news media, sources familiar with the matter said.

Read more...
